basics.name: Kieran Didi
basics.label: CompBio master's student
basics.summary: Excited about Drug Discovery, Protein Design and Entrepreneurship.

work.summary: - working on ML for protein design

- developing cloud-native software for DNA analysis using Spark, AWS and Terraform.
- published an IaC Terraform module for creating EMR Serverless applications on AWS
- Coordinating the communication strategy for Nucleate Cambridge, reaching students, inventors, and investors.
- conducting ML and bioinformatic analysis as well as literature research in order to communicate insights

- designed peptide therapeutics and worked on screening system (publication in peer-review)
- built database for high-quality antibody sequences, including data quality control and annotation
- developed ML models with PyTorch and processing pipeline to quantify nativeness of antibody sequences

Team IAA in cooperation with Janssen Pharmaceuticals: 
- worked on a screening system for autoimmune diseases
- identification of auto-antigens, construction of T cell reporter lines

volunteer.summary: Organized nationwide comms strategy for empowering biotech talents

In the context of the Biology Olympiad, I organize internships for successful and motivated participants and am the responsible coordinator between the pupils and the supervising professors or PhD students.
As a member of the Conference Administration of the Student Council Heidelberg, I organized and led the conferences and worked together with people from all different backgrounds on proposals.

awards.title: DAAD and Studienstiftung scholarship
awards.summary: Received two scholarships for my master's studies at Cambridge due to academic grades and performance at interviews

awards.title: Sartorius STEM scholarship
awards.summary: Received the Sartorius scholarship due to academic achievements and performance at video interview and in-person assesment center

awards.title: ICU Scholarship
awards.summary: One of seven finalists awarded the ICU Scholarship by the business and leadership network QX. The scholarships allows participation in international conferences such as the MBA World Summit or the Leadership Conference, includes intensive management mentoring and a lot of different activities to foster exchange between the scholars and the network.

awards.title: German Academic Foundation Scholarship
awards.summary: Full scholarship for both undergraduate and master's studies

awards.title: Silver Medal
awards.summary: Came in second in nationwide competition, silver medal at the international competition in Teheran.

awards.title: NanoBio Vice-winner
awards.summary: At the "NanoBio" Competition, my team and I came in second nationwide for our project in which we constructed artificial muscle fibres out of Nylon and analyzed their properties.

awards.title: DECHEMAX Top 10 Germany
awards.awarder: DECHEMA Gesellschaft für Chemische Technik und Biotechnologie e.V.
awards.summary: At the "DECHEMAX" competition my team and I were chosen as one of the ten best teams in Germany for our experimental performance.

certificates.name: Fundamentals of Deep Learning for Multi-GPUs
